               org.lwjgl.util.vector.Vector2f position,

               boolean centered)
        Constructor
        Parameters:
        text - String defining rendered text
        fontSize - Float of font size (1 Default)
        font - Font to be used
        position - Position of text in screen space
        maxLineLength - Maximum length of line (Screen Space)
        centered - Centered on screen
